name: Time Limit Harvest（タイムリミットハーベスト）
name_original: Time Limit Harvest（タイムリミットハーベスト）
description:
"Time Limit Harvest" is a game in which the goal is to grow and sell crops within a time limit and earn as much profit as possible.
As you level up, you can acquire tools and crop seeds.
You can extend the time limit by spending the money you earn.
Mouse, keyboard, and controller are supported.
